duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and coordinate logistics team activities, including inbound, outbound, deployment, and supply depot services.
Provide high-level technical assistance to the team and ensure service and support is provided to customers at agreed levels.
Escalation point for issues that are blocking the Logistics Technicians.
Manage inbound services, shipment deliveries, and deployment to all local sites.
Maintain proper inventory levels and manage inventory and service health of all respective sites.
Initiate monthly cycle counts, document variances, track root cause, and orchestrate cycle counts.
Report trends and observations, participate in root cause analysis, and drive process improvements.
Identify and create process improvements, resolve issues, and lead special projects.
Collaborate with inventory control personnel and maintain cycle count KPI.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred or equivalent work experience
